Material used.Material Name: HEK293 or other relevant cell lines
Material used.Description: Cells transfected with wild-type or mutant PINK1 constructs.

Readout description.Variant: To be determined via API for each variant
Readout description.Result Description: Phosphorylation levels were significantly reduced in cells expressing mutant PINK1.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 construct used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector transfected cells as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA or similar statistical methods were used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation levels above a certain threshold indicating normal function.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation levels below the threshold indicating impaired function.
